publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3243 Mr David Davidson: Scottish Men's Lacrosse Team-That the Parliament wishes every success to the Scottish Men's Lacrosse Team at the World Cup Competition in Perth, Australia; notes that the team has received no support from sportscotland in achieving this, and recommends that men's lacrosse in Scotland has a separate association from women's lacrosse.
S1M-3243 Scottish Men's Lacrosse Team (lodged on 21 June 2002) Michael Russell*
S1M-3243 Scottish Men's Lacrosse Team (lodged on 21 June 2002) Mr Keith Harding*
S1M-3243 Scottish Men's Lacrosse Team (lodged on 21 June 2002) Brian Adam*
